title: Senior Business Analyst
description:
Role : Senior Business Analyst

Location : Hyderabad

Duration : Long term contract

Job Scope


Shaping and defining the true business problem statement, opportunity, and associated requirement, covering People, Process and Technology
Proposing and Delivering solutions that resolve the business problem and setting out impacts and risks
Independently leading and delivering the business analysis activities on projects and programs
Integrity and alignment of the proposed and chosen solutions with business needs
Test planning, execution, and coordination
Ensuring risk and compliance standards are followed for every changes
Driving continuous improvement through process improvement
Training to Operational users
Development and professionalism of themselves and the business analyst community
Guiding and leading junior team members in project delivery



Requirements

Required Skills & Experience:


More than 8 years of working experience in Life/Health Insurance Domain
Good interpersonal communication and written skills
Deep understanding about various insurance domain related applications like Life Policy admins features and functionalities(Life Asia), Workflow, Salesforce, Imaging and CCM
Strong understanding of Agile / Iterative delivery methodology
